title: 4 Night Stay - Great Loactation
text:
Stayed here 4 nights, check in was friendly with the staff speaking good English.
The location is perfect! Having no real idea what to expect on my first visit to Paris, this hotel made it easy with a great location, easy access to restaurants, shops and site seeing. The front of the hotel is also very accessible for pickups for organized shuttles and tours.
The room was very clean & comfortable with good air conditioning and the free wifi worked well. My room was very quiet which was great for a good nights sleep.
If there was a negative, it would be the shower over the bath with the glass screen and leaking water although I didn't let this ruin my stay.
Enjoyed my stay and would happily return to this hotel.
